channel.title: Need a logo for my Pures home website please
channel.description:
Well I already supplied you with enough for the image, all I need is some awesome text (thats not crappy btw).
Here is the picture I want you to edit: http://fc78.deviantart.com/fs28/f/2008/063/1/b/Rise_of_the_Prince_by_ahbeejieh.jpg And here is where I want my text to be: http://i44.tinypic.com/2v2wmtz.png
Now it would be more awesome if you could like put some glowing lines around him (making it seem like hes absorbing some sort of protecting power). I'd do all this myself but gimp suck so I can do everything like I want it to be.

item.title: Need a logo for my Pures home website please
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I use both gimp and Photoshop, what are you talking about.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a logo for my Pures home website please

item.title: Need a logo for my Pures home website please
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Gimp… You think its easy because all you have to do is use simple buttons to make a text glow in photoshop. But Gimp, its actually harder then anyone here thinks… Only way I know of is to wright some text, paste it again and blur it, but its not working the right way I want it. Beside, photoshop has more focus (aka smoothness) on colors then gimp.

In gimp you have to go into deep, raw details to get what you want. Photoshop, its easier to use. If I knew how to get my photoshop to work then I wouldn’t have such as BS time doing this myself. But apparently no one hasn’t answered my previous problem so you can’t say much if you talk about me using photoshop (until I get my problem fixed maybe/though).

Read full topic
item.source: Need a logo for my Pures home website please

item.title: Need a logo for my Pures home website please
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Firstly, Gimp doesn’t suck, it is very capable of doing the easy crap you just said. Second, that sounds awful, that’s what beginners do. I wouldn’t even waste my time opening photoshop to do something so simple. And no one else should either. If you’re not capable of placing some text on an image, and brushing a little, then you don’t deserve it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a logo for my Pures home website please
